content.text: Grid Layouts arrange items in a two-dimensional, scrollable grid. They are excellent for displaying collections of items of a similar nature, such as images or text items.
Important attributes include `numColumns` (number of columns), `columnWidth` (width of each column), and `android:stretchMode` to control how items fill their space.

content.code:
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <GridView
        android:id="@+id/grid_view"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:numColumns="auto_fit"
        android:columnWidth="48dp"
        android:layout_margin="24dp"/>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
